title: Shop Inman by Moonlight, Dec 17, 2006
name: Shop Inman by Moonlight, Dec 17, 2006
description:
A Map by Tracy_the_astonishing

This map shows the businesses participating in the shop Inman by Moonlight event.


***

christmas, shopping, night, late night, fun, hang out, lovely

properties.name: 1369 Coffee House
properties.description: Posted by Bratfarrar 1369 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MAThe original, smaller location for the 1369 coffee house. A bit more laid back than its Central Square counterpart. Good coffee, good baked goods, medium lighting, great location.

properties.name: ABZ Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 186 Hampshire St. Cambridge, Massachusetts 02139Fine art group show of Jamaica Plain artists, Dec 2, 2006 - Jan 2, 2007

properties.name: All-Star Sandwich Bar
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing1245 Cambridge Street, Cambridge, MA

properties.name: Bird by Bird
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing1361 Cambridge St. Cambridge, Massachusetts 02139For the December 14th Christmas event, Bird by Bird will be offering face painting and wine & cheese. Spend 50 & qualify to receive a free 8x10 children\'s portrait by photographer Gregory Katsoulis. Shape-Up, Baby Fitness Class promotion by personal trainer Jess Perkins. (Class soon to be open in the basement of Bird by Bird to new moms and woman of all fitness levels.) Discounted personal training gift certificates.

properties.name: Boutique Fabulous
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing1309 Cambridge Street, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02139This is a cool shop selling clothes and accessories for all ages. On Dec 14th, for the Christmas event they\'ll have DJ Elf E Elf, Steve Baril, Singer & Songwriter Dave Wildman. Live Window Performances by Improv Boston. Santa Claus. Hors d\'oeuvres & Refreshments.

properties.name: Bukowski Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  1281 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MA

properties.name: City Girl Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 204 Hampshire St. Cambridge, MA617-864-2809 On Dec 14th, Drop in & Enjoy our delicious & free pizza triangles & cookies. Enter to win the City Girl Café contest for a prize & receive a off coupon. Gift Certificates available.

properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 1271 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MAEast Coast Grill will be giving away hot cider on the sidewalk in front of the restaurant.

properties.name: Improv Boston
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 1253 Cambridge St. Cambridge, MAFor the December 14 Late-night holiday event, Improv Boston will have wandering Holiday Carolers around the square. Show Gift Certificates available. Window performances at Boutique Fabulous.

properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  1343 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MAsupermarket

properties.name: Lorem Ipsum Books
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 157 Hampshire St, Cambridge, MAOn Dec 14th, Lorem Ipsum is offering refreshments, free gift wrapping, and a 15% discount on all purchases.

properties.name: Magnolia's
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 1193 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MA(617) 576-1971 Southern Cuisine.

properties.name: Ole Mexican Grill
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 11 Springfield St, Cambridge, MAOn Dec 14th, the restaurant is offering a 15% discount on all gift certificates purchased on the night of Shop Inman by Moonlight. One free appetizer per table w/ dinner if you show a receipt of purchase, dated Dec 14th, from participating stores.

properties.name: Oleana
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 134 Hampshire St, Cambridge, MAThe Cuisine centers on the Arabic influenced foods of the Mediterranean with a strong lean towards Turkish; the dishes are layered with flavor and unusual spice combinations. Details such as spice blends, pressed coffees and homemade ice creams set Oleana apart.Oleana with its interesting menu and warm environment is a neighborhood restaurant all about comfort.

properties.name: Punjabi Dhaba
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 225 Hampshire St, Cambridge, MAPH: (617) 547-8272 TAKE OUT AND EAT-IN YOU MAY ORDER TAKE OUT BY PHONE! NO RESERVATIONS NECESSARY ALWAYS BUSY SO COME QUICK JOIN US FOR GREAT FOOD AND LOTS OF FUN!

properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 1385 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MA

properties.name: Rosie's Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing243 hampshire St, Cambridge, MAfor the December 14th event, Rosie\'s is giving away free treats at Urban Oasis, next door.

properties.name: Ryles Jazz Club, Sunday
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  212 Hampshire St, Cambridge, MASalsa Sundays at Ryles! Dance, Lessons & Dinner Buffet! Enjoy an early evening of Salsa music, dance, and food in the company of friends and friends to be made. Take in a Salsa and Merengue lesson at 6. Enjoy a dinner buffet starting at 7. Dance to the best Salsa, Merengue, and Cha Cha music from 7 to 11 pm. Admission is 0 and includes lesson and dance. Lessons: 6-7pm | Dance: 7-11pm|0pp Dinner buffet is only per plate extra. 18+. Free parking.

properties.name: S&S Restaurant and Deli
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 1334 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MA, 02138

properties.name: Stellabella Toys
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  1360 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MAThis is a huge, fantastic, high-quality toy shop. On Thursday Dec 14th for the Moonlight Shopping Event, the Cambridge Rindge high school dance group will perform short vignettes in the Cambridge Street window. Live music in the store from the Paddy Saul group (a trio.) Fortune teller/card reader. Light refreshments.

properties.name: The Druid, 9:30pm-2:00am
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  1357 Cambridge St, Cambridge, MADJ Nighttime Gallagher will be playing on Dec 14th for the late-night Christmas event.

properties.name: The Flower Pot
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 192 Hampshire St, Cambridge, MAFlower shop

properties.name: Urban Oasis
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing243 hampshire St, Cambridge, MAHot tubs and massage therapy! This is a great place to know about to help you get through the winter. They have a community tub (swimwear required) and private tubs (swimwear optional). Kids are welcome as long as they are potty trained. On Thursday Dec 14th they\'re offering Free Soaks in the Hot Tubs (bring a suit!) from 8:30 to midnight. Gift Certificate Specials, including a coupon to Rosie\'s Bakery with every purchase! DJ Mocha spinning tub side 8:30- Midnight. Free treats from Rosie\'s Bakery.
